alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seminole, western Orange and central Volusia Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Helen in Southern Volusia County to near Lake Buena Vista in Orange County. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Port Orange, Sanford and Apopka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Orange; Seminole
